q: Reid, who dealt with family problems when two of his sons were arrested on drug charges, believed Michael Vick could change around his life. Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind him as Reid. He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field, Reid said. In the middle of a speech that addressed segregation, radicalisation and "the doctrine of state multiculturalism", David Cameron declared: We need to be absolutely clear on where the origins of these terrorist attacks lie- and that is the existence of an ideology, "Islamist extremism." He went on to argue: "Frankly, we need a lot less of the passive tolerance of recent years and much more active, muscular liberalism." Strong stuff

Microsoft also faces very big strategic challenges as smartphones and tablets attack your highly profitable installed base business. Nokia's reported smartphone market share slid to 31 percent in the fourth quarter from 40 percent a year earlier as consumers defected to Apple Google Inc. .'s iPhone and models based on Android.
